src.backend.arm_backend package

src.backend.arm_backend.arm_backend module

class src.backend.arm_backend.arm_backend.ArmBackend(project_config: ProjectConfiguration)[source]

Bases: Backend

generate_executable(filepath: str, func_name: str, inputs: str, measure_folder: str) → str[source]

Modifies the input program to use INPUTS and generates the executable code. Stored at MEASURE_FOLDER/driver

Parameters:
filepath: str :

Path to C file to modify with inputs.

func_name: str :

Name of function being analyzed.

inputs: str :

Path to the INPUTS file containing output of symbolic solver.

measure_folder: str :

The folder to store generated executable.

Returns:
str:

Path to the executable code.

measure(inputs: str, measure_folder: str) → int[source]

Perform measurement using the backend.

Parameters:
inputs: str:

the inputs to drive down a PATH in a file

measure_folder: str :

all generated files will be stored in MEASURE_FOLDER/{name of backend}

Returns:
int:

The measured value of path

run_backend_and_parse_output(stored_folder: str, executable_path: str) → int[source]

Runs the executable in EXECUTABLE_PATH in host machine and extracts the outputs from program. Temperaries are stored in STORED_FOLDER.

Parameters:
stored_folder: str :

Folder to put all the generated tempraries.

executable_path: str :

Path to executable.

Returns:
int:

Measured cycle count for EXECUTABLE_PATH.

timing_func = '\nstatic inline unsigned long long read_cycle_count() {\n    unsigned long long val;\n    asm volatile("mrs %0, PMCCNTR_EL0" : "=r" (val));\n    return val;\n}\n'
